answer: I am living here in Tokyo and nobody worries much. Don't worry if your plane lands in Tokyo. I don't have a Geiger counter but hearing from the local news Tokyo seems quite safe. Other places more in the south Mt Fuji Osaka Kyoto Nara Nagoya Okinawa should be even safer. You might just want to avoid the Fukushima area even though going there for a day or two should be OK. If you're worried don't drink tap water and avoid lettuce leaves actually those advices were valid 2 months ago but it might be overkill now .
